name: Email Engagement Analytics
description: Two views: (v1) per-email slide-out with hero metrics, recipient list, link performance, 24h timeline; (v2) audience engagement overview showing all contacts ranked by engagement with sparkline history, going-cold warnings, and relationship insights.

versions.notes: Per-email detail: Slide-out panel over email hub list. Hero metric cards (Delivered, Clicked, Bounced with rates). Recipients grouped into 5 tiers. Link performance table with avatar stacks. 24-hour engagement timeline bar chart.

Audience engagement overview: Full-page view showing all contacts ranked by engagement across last 6 emails. Four tiers: Highly Engaged (green), Active (blue), Going Cold (amber warning bg + missed count), Unreachable (red + update email action). Each row has a 6-bar sparkline (clicked/opened/delivered/none/bounced). Summary stats at top. Relationship Insights section at bottom with AI-assumed intelligence (no sparkles) â€” specific callouts like 'Chris Martinez hasn't opened your last 3 updates' and 'Sarah Vance clicked financial links in 5 of 6 emails'.

patterns: grouped sections with dot indicator + count
sparkline bars (6px wide, color-coded by engagement level)
AI-assumed relationship insights (no sparkles, no branding)
